items.title: Add Lux Network Programmatically
items.description: This document shows how to integrate Lux Network with your Dapp, either by Core or MetaMask.

items.title: Add Lux Network Programmatically
items.description: This document shows how to integrate Lux Network with your Dapp, either by Core or MetaMask.

items.title: Adjusting Gas Price During High Network Activity
items.description: This tutorial will help users to adjust their priority fee and max fee cap during high network activity and take advantage of the benefits of dynamic fee transactions.

items.title: Building on the C-Chain
items.description: Lux C-Chain is a blockchain that can run all the Solidity smart contracts from Ethereum, but with much greater transaction bandwidth and instant finality from Lux's revolutionary consensus mechanism.

items.title: C-Chain Exchange Integration
items.description: The objective of this document is to provide a brief overview of how to integrate with the EVM-Compatible Lux C-Chain.

items.title: Create an ERC-20 Token Using Solidity
items.description: ERC-20 tokens are the most fundamental and essential concept in Ethereum. This same token standard is adopted in the Lux ecosystem.

items.title: Deploy a Smart Contract on Lux Using Remix and Core
items.description: In this doc, learn how to deploy and test a smart contract on Lux using Remix and Core.

items.title: Deploy a Smart Contract on Lux Using thirdweb
items.description: Launching any new or existing Solidity decentralized app on Lux C-Chain fosters the same developer experience as Ethereum, but benefits from the security, speed, and interoperability of the Lux Network.

items.title: Deploy an ERC-721 NFT Collection on Lux
items.description: This tutorial will walkthrough deploying a basic ERC-721 (NFT) smart contract on the Lux Network. This is a beginner friendly tutorial; No previous development experience necessary.

items.title: Get Test Funds from the Testnet Faucet
items.description: This tutorial focuses on how to get a "drip" of LUX from the Testnet faucet.

items.title: Interact with a Solidity Smart Contract from a Golang Application
items.description: This tutorial demonstrates how to compile a solidity contract into Golang to deploy and call contracts programmatically.

items.title: Launch an Ethereum Dapp on Lux
items.description: Launching any new or existing Solidity decentralized app on Lux C-Chain fosters the same developer experience as Ethereum, but benefits from the security, speed, and interoperability of the Lux Network.

items.title: Lux Block Explorer
items.description: These Lux Block Explorers allow you to query historical Mainnet, testnet, and Subnet block data.

items.title: Lux C-Chain Settings
items.description: Launching any new or existing Solidity decentralized app on Lux C-Chain fosters the same developer experience as Ethereum, but benefits from the security, speed, and interoperability of the Lux Network. Get connected with Lux C-Chain Settings

items.title: Lux Netrunner
items.description: The Lux Netrunner (ANR) allows a user to define, create and interact with a network of Lux nodes. It can be used for development and testing.

items.title: Preparing NFT Files for an ERC721 Smart Contract
items.description: ERC-721 tokens are one of the most fundamental and essential concepts in Ethereum. This same token standard is adopted in the Lux ecosystem.

items.title: Sending Transactions with Dynamic Fees using JavaScript
items.description: This tutorial will help users to send transactions with dynamic fee settings to adjust their priority fee and max fee cap during high network activity using javascript.

items.title: Testnet Workflow
items.description: An end-to-end walkthrough of necessary development activities for a bare-bones decentralized application.

items.title: Testnet Workflow
items.description: An end-to-end walkthrough of necessary development activities for a bare-bones decentralized application.

items.title: Using Foundry with the Lux C-Chain
items.description: This guide shows how to deploy and interact with smart contracts using foundry on a local Lux Network and the Testnet C-Chain.

items.title: Using Hardhat with the Lux C-Chain
items.description: The goal of this guide is to lay out best practices regarding writing, testing and deployment of smart contracts to Lux's C-Chain using Hardhat.

items.title: Using Truffle with the Lux C-Chain
items.description: Launching any new or existing Solidity decentralized app on Lux C-Chain fosters the same developer experience as Ethereum, but benefits from the security, speed, and interoperability of the Lux Network.

items.title: Verify Smart Contracts on the C-Chain Explorer
items.description: This tutorial walks through verifying a smart contract on the Snowtrace block explorer.

items.title: Verifying Smart Contracts Using Hardhat and Snowtrace
items.description: This tutorial walks through verifying a smart contract on a block explorer using Hardhat after deploying it to Lux C-Chain.

items.title: Verifying Smart Contracts with Truffle Verify
items.description: This tutorial walks through verifying a smart contract on a block explorer using Truffle after deploying it to Lux C-Chain.
